Package com.example.seqr.controllers

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.example.seqr.controllers.EventController
public class EventController extends Object
Controller class for managing Event data in Firestore database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventController()
    Constructs an EventController and initializes Firestore database reference.

      Retrieves all events from database.
      Parameters:
      onCompleteListener - Listener to be invoked when the data retrieval is complete.

    • getEventsByOrganizer

      public void getEventsByOrganizer(String organizerUUID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> onCompleteListener)
      Retrieves events from database by organizer UUID (only for the specific organizer).
      Parameters:
      organizerUUID - The UUID of the organizer.
      onCompleteListener - Listener to be invoked when the data retrieval is complete.

      Parameters:
      eventId - eventID of the event

      public void signUserUpForEvent(String eventId, SignUp signUp)
      Signs the user up for an event
      Parameters:
      eventId - the eventID of the event
      signUp - the signUp object that contains the id and username of someone who signed up
